title: The King Who Lost His Colors
description: Can a friendly traveler from the Far East restore a brilliant forest in one week? King Daniel lives in one of the most beautiful areas in all of Northern Europe, but tragedy has struck and no one in the kingdom of Colorwood knows how to cheer up the saddened king. The King Who Lost His Colors will take you on a trip back in time to a place where the simplicity of nature's beauty is able to entertain a kingdom.
author: Glen Liset
